goals__remit:
Somfy is the world leader in the automatic control of openings and closures in homes and buildings. 
 
INSPIRING A BETTER WAY OF LIVING ACCESSIBLE TO ALL 
 
At Somfy Group, we believe that meeting the basic human desire to improve where we live is fundamentally linked to technology solutions. These solutions represent a real step forward. The men and women of Somfy Group and its brands are dedicated to developing innovations that are accessible to all. 
 
Because everyone aspires to better living environments.
